name: The Rapid Malaysia - 7 destination, 3 cities
description: I call this trip a 'Rapid trip'. Join this one day tour, I will guide you through the biggest 3 cultural centers of Malaysia that will give you the full picture about the traditions and customs followed by the local here. I have experience of guiding more than 50 people coming to Malaysia and each had a unique and memorable trip with me, hope you will enjoy this trip :)
